tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE learning_resources (resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY, resource_name VARCHAR(255), resource_type VARCHAR(50), resource_url TEXT, topic VARCHAR(100))

CREATE TABLE learning_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    resource_topic VARCHAR(100),
    resource_link VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE student_profiles (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(255),
    student_major VARCHAR(50),
    student_level INT,
    student_interests VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE learning_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    topic VARCHAR(100),
    URL VARCHAR(255),
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    grade_level VARCHAR(10),
    interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE resource_access (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    access_date DATE,
    access_duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES learning_resources(resource_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
)

CREATE TABLE recommended_resources (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    recommended_resource_id INT,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recommended_resource_id) REFERENCES learning_resources(resource_id)
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_title VARCHAR(255),
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    category_id INT,
    resource_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    student_email VARCHAR(100),
    student_major VARCHAR(50),
    student_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE recommended_materials (
    student_id INT,
    resource_id INT,
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES resources(resource_id)
);

CREATE TABLE resource_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES resources(resource_id)
);
